bug.author: zubairbaqai
bug.summary: Unable to do prediction on OneshotDetection
bug.description: When i save the model and load it back i get turicreate.toolkits._main.ToolkitError: No neural network compute context provided furthermore when i tried to print back the value before saving the model i am getting [] i am trying to run the example code of stop sign , still fails . hope someone can help me

comments.comment: This should fix the first error you are getting. For the second one, how many iterations are you training the model for?
i tried with 5000 as well . still no success
Tracking the empty predictions in a separate issue (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/turicreate/issues/2964>#2964</denchmark-link> ) and letting this issue track the error.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/zubairbaqai>@zubairbaqai</denchmark-link> Can you tell us what platform (Linux, Mac), GPU and TuriCreate version you are using?
